content: That's a great idea! I'll make sure to include a gift card to a meal delivery service or a local restaurant with the diaper subscription service and twin baby carrier. I think I'll go with a gift card to a local restaurant that offers delivery and takeout, so they can get some meals taken care of during this busy time. Do you think I should also consider adding a gift for Karen's older daughter, Olivia, since she's now a big sister?
